occupation_3p.name: 1 Occupation (3-player)
occupation_3p.summary: Play one Occupation card for 2 Food
occupation_3p.body: Play 1 Occupation card from your hand face-up on the table and read it aloud. This action always costs 2 Food, regardless of how many Occupations you have already played.
occupation_3p.details: Used in 3-player games only. More expensive than the Occupation space printed on the game board (where the first card is free).

reed_stone_food_4p.name: Take 1 Reed, 1 Stone and 1 Food
reed_stone_food_4p.summary: Take 1 Reed, 1 Stone, and 1 Food from supply
reed_stone_food_4p.body: Take 1 Reed, 1 Stone, and 1 Food from the general supply and place them in your personal supply.
reed_stone_food_4p.details: Used in 4-player games only. These resources do not accumulate â€” the same amounts are always available regardless of how many rounds have passed.

occupation_4p.name: 1 Occupation (4-player)
occupation_4p.summary: Play one Occupation card; cost varies by how many you've played
occupation_4p.body: Play 1 Occupation card from your hand face-up on the table and read it aloud. If this is your first or second Occupation card, it costs 1 Food. Each subsequent Occupation card costs 2 Food.
occupation_4p.details: Used in 4-player games only. This is an additional Occupation space beyond the one printed on the game board.

traveling_players.name: Traveling Players
traveling_players.summary: Accumulates 1 Food per round; take all Food from this space
traveling_players.body: During Phase 2 (Replenish), 1 Food is placed on this space each round. When you select this action, take all accumulated Food from the space.
traveling_players.details: Used in 4-player games (standalone space) and 5-player games (combined with Build 1 Room). Food accumulates each round if not taken.

reed_stone_wood_5p.name: Take 1 Reed, also 1 Stone and 1 Wood
reed_stone_wood_5p.summary: Take accumulating Reed, plus 1 Stone and 1 Wood from supply
reed_stone_wood_5p.body: During Phase 2 (Replenish), 1 Reed is placed on this space each round and accumulates. When you select this action, take all accumulated Reed from the space, plus 1 Stone and 1 Wood directly from the general supply. Stone and Wood do not accumulate on this space.

take_animals_5p.name: Take Animals (choice)
take_animals_5p.summary: Choose one: Sheep + 1 Food, Wild Boar, or pay 1 Food for Cattle
take_animals_5p.body: Choose one of three options: (1) Take 1 Sheep and 1 Food from supply; (2) Take 1 Wild Boar from supply; or (3) Pay 1 Food to take 1 Cattle from supply. The chosen animal must be placed immediately into your farmyard or converted to Food using an appropriate Improvement.
take_animals_5p.details: Used in 5-player games only. Only one player may use this Action space per round, and choosing one option prevents other players from choosing the others that round.

occupation_or_family_growth_5p.name: 1 Occupation or, from Round 5, Family Growth
occupation_or_family_growth_5p.summary: Play an Occupation; or from Round 5, take Family Growth instead
occupation_or_family_growth_5p.body: Play 1 Occupation card from your hand (1 Food for 1st or 2nd Occupation; 2 Food for subsequent). From the start of Round 5 onwards, you may instead choose to take Family Growth: add a newborn Family member (requires a spare room). The newborn is placed on the Action space and returns home at end of round.
occupation_or_family_growth_5p.details: Used in 5-player games only. The Family Growth option becomes available from Round 5 onward. Families are limited to 5 members.

build_room_or_traveling_players_5p.name: Build 1 Room or Traveling Players
build_room_or_traveling_players_5p.summary: Build one room, or take accumulated Food from the Traveling Players space
build_room_or_traveling_players_5p.body: Choose one option: (1) Build 1 room using the standard costs (5 matching material + 2 Reed), placed orthogonally adjacent to existing rooms. Unlike the main Build Room(s) space, only a single room may be built here. (2) Take all accumulated Food from the Traveling Players portion of this space (1 Food is added per round). If you build a room, the accumulated Food remains on the space for another player.
build_room_or_traveling_players_5p.details: Used in 5-player games only. Each round, 1 Food is placed on the Traveling Players portion regardless of which option players choose.
